articles.title: Kim Jong Il Issues Order on Raising Military Ranks
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Issues Order on Raising Military Ranks
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Il Friday issued order 0046 on raising the military ranks of commanding officers of the KPA. 
					 The order said: 
					
					 KPA unit 963 has performed distinguished feats in the socialist construction including the construction of the Nyongwon Power Station and the Mirim Barrage in the past and given full play to the revolutionary soldier spirit in the construction of the Huichon Power Station, an outpost in building a thriving nation, bringing about ceaseless miracles and innovations in their construction projects and creditably performing their role as vanguard and a shock brigade.  
					
					 The Supreme Commander said in his order that he ordered to promote the military ranks of Yun Jong Rin to general and that of Kim Song Dok to col. general on the occasion of the significant army day, expressing the firm belief that the commanding officers of the unit would as ever firmly defend the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms and creditably discharge the honorable mission and duty as a main force of the revolution in the building of a thriving socialist nation, true to the leadership of the party.

articles.title: DPRK to Freeze S. Korean Assets in Mt. Kumgang
articles.content:
DPRK to Freeze S. Korean Assets in Mt. Kumgang
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Guidance Bureau for the Development of Scenic Spots of the DPRK issued the following statement Friday:
					 The DPRK recently took such a bold measure of freezing five useless real estates of the south side in the Mt. Kumgang Tourist Zone as the first-phase measure to cope with the grave situation where there was no hope of resuming the tour due to the south Korean authorities' vicious moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK and their insincere attitude.
					
					 This was a quite natural exercise of its sovereignty and an entirely legitimate application of sanctions in full line with not only the inter-Korean relations but international practice and norms.
					
					 We have so far made every sincere effort for the resumption of tour and shown broad magnanimity till the last moment the tour was put on the verge of collapse.
					
					 The south side, however, far from giving due consideration to our sincerity and magnanimity and repenting of and apologizing for its criminal moves, behaved more arrogantly, crying out for "lifting the above-said measures." It went the lengths of blatantly challenging us, talking about "a countermeasure" only to remind one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					  Minister of Unification of south Korea Hyon In Thaek went so foolish as to threaten the DPRK while blustering that the south will "strongly react to the north" if it takes additional freezing measures. Traitor Lee Myung Bak made no scruple of impudently defiling even the function for commemorating the Day of the Sun, not content with getting hell-bent on escalating confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					  The puppet group went the lengths of crying out for the total severance of the north-south relations and trumpeting about "not ruling out a war" while deliberately linking the sinking of its warship to the DPRK.
					
					  The situation has reached such extreme phase that it is at the crossroads of a war or peace, much less thinking of the resumption of the tour.
					
					  It is quite natural that we can no longer show generosity and tolerance to the south side under this situation.
					
					  April during which we have kept the door for the resumption of tour open has almost passed. 
					
					  The number of new businessmen hoping to deal with the tour of Mt. Kumgang is on the steady increase.
					
					  It is self-evident that the DPRK, land of famous scenic spots, can not remain idle at this golden tourist season due to the puppet group. 
					
					 We will take resolute steps for punishment in succession as already clarified now that the puppet group is persistently standing in the way of resuming the tour.
					
					 The General Guidance Bureau for the Development of Scenic Spots of the DPRK is authorized by a relevant organ to solemnly declare that it embarks upon implementing the following second-phase measures as a follow-up of the first-phase measures to freeze the real estates of the south side in the Mt. Kumgang Tourist Zone:
					
					 First, we will confiscate the Mt. Kumgang Reunion Center and the fire brigade belonging to the south Korean authorities and a cultural center, a hot spring resort, tax exemption office and two other objects belonging to the Tourist Company of south Korea which had already been frozen in compensation for the damage the north side suffered due to the suspension of the tour for a long period.
					
					 The confiscated real estates will be put into the possession of the DPRK or handed over to new businessmen according to legal procedures.
					
					 Second, we will freeze all the remaining real estates of the south side in the Mt. Kumgang Tourist Zone and expel all their management personnel.
					
					 The steps for freezing and confiscating the real estates of the south side in the zone were taken due to the puppet group and the blame for them rests with the south Korean authorities. 
					
					 It is tragedy and disgrace, indeed, that south Koreans' tour of Mt. Kumgang which had been under way amid the concern and joy of all the fellow countrymen at home and abroad for a decade is set to be totally blocked by the Lee Myung Bak conservative group.
					
					 The south Koreans and all other members of the nation will always curse the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for having derailed the tour of Mt. Kumgang which brought them hope for reunification.
					
					 We will take more rigid follow-up measures in case the puppet group goes reckless while vociferating about "strong reaction" to the legitimate steps taken by the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Cuban Military Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Cuban Military Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Cuban Revolutionary Armed Forces led by Alvaro Lopez Miera, vice-minister of Revolutionary Armed Forces and chief of the General Staff of the Cuban Revolutionary Armed Forces, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
					 Present there were Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and Ambassador Jose Manuel Galego Montano and Military Attache Leonardo Perez Mesa of the Cuban embassy here.

articles.title: Cuban Military Delegation Puts Wreath on Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
Cuban Military Delegation Puts Wreath on Martyrs Cemetery
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Cuban Revolutionary Armed Forces visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Friday.
					 Present on the occasion were members of the delegation headed by Alvaro Lopez Miera, vice-minister of Revolutionary Armed Forces and chief of the General Staff of the Cuban Revolutionary Armed Forces, and Military Attache Leonardo Perez Mesa of the Cuban embassy here and Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces of the DPRK.
					
					 A wreath in the name of the delegation was laid at the cemetery.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the revolutionary martyrs.
					
					 They also paid a silent tribute to the memory of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine, after placing bunches of flowers before her bust.
					
					 The head of the delegation made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Iranian Foreign Ministry Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Iranian Foreign Ministry Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Iran led by Vice-Minister Mohammad Ali Fathollahi on Friday when it paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
					 On hand were Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, and Morteza Moradian, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Gift from Iranian Official
articles.content:
Gift from Iranian Official
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Mohammad Ali Fathollahi, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of Iran who is heading the visiting ministry delegation.
					 Mohammad Ali Fathollahi handed the gift over to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly on Friday.

articles.title: Gifts from Syrian Damascus Univ. Delegation
articles.content:
Gifts from Syrian Damascus Univ. Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il were presented with gifts by a delegation of the University of Damascus of Syria on the occasion of the Day of the Sun. 
					 They were handed to an official concerned by Director of the Strategic Studies and Research Center of the university Sameer Ismaeel who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Chinese
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Chinese
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from the family of Zhang Weihua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on Friday with the 78th birthday of the Korean People's Army as an occasion.

articles.title: Economic and Commercial Corps Visits Pueblo
articles.content:
Economic and Commercial Corps Visits Pueblo
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps here visited the U.S. imperialist armed spy ship "Pueblo" on Friday on the occasion of the 78th birthday of the heroic Korean People's Army. 
					 They watched videos showing the armed spy ship being captured by navy men of the Korean People's Army while perpetrating espionage after intruding deep into the territorial waters of the DPRK, the U.S. side presenting a letter of apology and other scenes. Then they looked round the armory, the intelligence gathering room, ciphering room, 12.7mm caliber machine gun and other arms and equipment and spying facilities.
					
					 Dashnyam Nachin, secretary of the Mongolian embassy here, wrote in the visitor's book that the visit offered an opportunity to know well about the heroic exploits of the soldiers of the KPA. He wished the Korean people greater success in their efforts.

articles.title: Military Attaches Visit Revolutionary School
articles.content:
Military Attaches Visit Revolutionary School
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary School on Friday on the occasion of the 78th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 Members of the corps laid bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the school to pay tribute to him.
					
					 They were briefed on the facts that the school has covered the glorious course under the deep care of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and the schoolers have grown to be the hard core and backbone to carry forward the lineage of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Then, they appreciated an art performance given by schoolers after going round a lecture room and education facilities.

articles.title: Exhibition of Medical Apparatuses Held
articles.content:
Exhibition of Medical Apparatuses Held
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The 1st national exhibition of medical apparatuses was held here from Apr. 19 to 23. 
					 Presented there were at least 1,400 medical equipment and apparatuses of over 1,100 kinds and materials contrived and made by workers, scientists and technicians of 70 odd units.
					
					 Highly appreciated by the participants were dental X-ray device, supersonic wave inhaler, tooth-implanting tools and other exhibits.
					
					Also attracting them were the artificial heart beating controller, kidney stone destroyer, binocular microscope, microwave diagnostic tool, etc.
					
					 Its closing ceremony was held at the Three-Revolution Exhibition on Friday.

articles.title: New Feature Film Produced
articles.content:
New Feature Film Produced
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Korean April 25 Film Studio produced a feature film "Hwangcholnamu (Korean poplar) Company".
					 The film impressively tells about officers of a company of the Korean People's Army, who have taken pains to increase its combat capability by achieving the unity between officers and soldiers based on the revolutionary comradeship true to the noble intention of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In the film Mu Song, commander of the company, relieves a soldier from mental suffering and unhesitatingly risks his life to rescue a soldier who was put in danger in the course of military training.  Meanwhile, he educates soldiers in principle to strictly observe the military discipline.
					
					 A shower bath ground is successfully built in the company by its officers' devoted efforts and, after all, the soldiers respect the officers and do their best for them.
					
					 During his inspection of the company, the Supreme Commander of the KPA gives high appreciation of its officers' efforts devoted to the unity between officers and men in the company after watching a Korean poplar (Hwangcholnamu in Korean) near its barracks and sees to it that the company is called "Hwangcholnamu Company".
					
					 Through the portrayal of the company's officers, the film instills the idea that the KPA, the ranks of the Songun revolutionary comrades, is invincible as it has such admirable commanding officers.

articles.title: Kyonghung Restaurant Reconstructed
articles.content:
Kyonghung Restaurant Reconstructed
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Beer House belonging to the Kyonghung Restaurant in Pothonggang District, Pyongyang has been reconstructed in a fashionable way.
					 The Beer House is coated with tiles of pale yellow and brown colors.
					
					 The central hall has a two-step ceiling, the first patterned with barley and the second decorated with chandeliers. 
					
					 Installed in the hall are fittings needed to serve seven kinds of beer -- 100 percent barley beer, 30, 50, 70 and 100 percent rice beer and two kinds of black beer.
					
					 The Beer House can accommodate 3,000-4,000 customers a day.
					
					 It, with main and auxiliary buildings, covers 2,000 square meters.
					
					 An Son Hui, 56, manager of the Kyonghung Restaurant, told KCNA she was glad to serve several kinds of fresh and peculiar beer to customers in all seasons.

articles.title: Guidelines for National Unity
articles.content:
Guidelines for National Unity
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il made public a famous work, "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation", in April Juche 87 (1998).
					 The work serves as a political programme which gives overall answers to the theoretical and practical questions arising in developing in accordance with the actual conditions the Juche-oriented policy of national unity laid down by President Kim Il Sung and achieving the country's reunification with the Korean people's concerted efforts.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, in the work, put forth a five-point policy of national unity. Its keynote is to unite on the principle of national independence and under the banner of patriotism and national reunification, improve the north-south relations, fight against outsiders' domination and interference and anti-reunification forces, develop visits, contacts and dialogue among all Koreans and strengthen their solidarity.
					
					 The policy has made it possible for the Korean nation to invigorate the movement for independence and reunification with a powerful ideological and theoretical weapon for putting on a higher level the cause of great national unity started by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The effort for national unity and reunification has become a nationwide movement involving Koreans of various social strata in the north, the south and abroad and signal achievements, including the adoption of the June 15 North-South joint declaration, have been recorded in the inter-Korean relations and the pro-reunification movement.
					
					 Now the movement for national reunification is running into blind wall owing to outsiders and anti-reunification forces seeking to deteriorate the inter-Korean relations and keep Korea from being reunified.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have intensified a smear campaign against the north and confrontation with it and even blocked the tour of Mt. Kumgang, a symbol of inter-Korean cooperation.
					
					 Inspired by the policy for national unity, however, the Korean people have made strenuous efforts to promote the historical cause of national reunification, frustrating the obstructive moves of outsiders and the conservative ruling quarters of south Korea.

articles.title: Japanese Media Accused of Anti-DPRK False Propaganda
articles.content:
Japanese Media Accused of Anti-DPRK False Propaganda
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Sankei Shimbun, Fuji TV, Nihon TV and other ultra rightwing conservative media are busy with their false propaganda malignantly slandering the ideology and system in the DPRK. This comes under fire by a signed commentary of Minju Joson Friday.
					 The evermore undisguised anti-DPRK smear campaign of the above-said TV broadcasting services is a wanton violation of the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and a challenge to it and a grave infringement upon copyright, a violation of international law, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The above-said TV broadcasting services are doing such despicable things as deliberately adapting for their programs DPRK films telecast by satellite without any permission from copyright holders. 
					
					 Japan is such a rogue state as to vociferate about "observance" of international law when it appears favorable for Japan, but to defy it without hesitation in pursuance of its own interests.
					
					 Those media are busy fabricating fictions, exaggerating things and spreading sheer lies in a bid to build public opinion critical of the DPRK under the authorities' patronage and at their tacit connivance. 
					
					 Sankei Shimbun and other ultra rightwing papers of Japan have moved to copy necessary sentences and phrases from articles carried by media of the DPRK after deleting their first and last parts, distort cases or craft lies in order to use them for their anti-DPRK smear campaigns. 
					
					 These media neither wish to face up to the reality of the DPRK nor want to hear about it. It is, therefore, a mockery and deception of the press for them to talk about "objective reporting," while cooking up anti-DPRK programs in the dimly-lit back rooms. 
					
					 The DPRK will never remain an onlooker to the anti-DPRK hysteria of the ultra rightwing conservative media of Japan and the tricksters will have to pay dearly for their politically motivated provocations.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Group's Sophism Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Group's Sophism Assailed
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Hyon In Thaek, puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, was recently reported to have blustered that the measure taken by the north side to freeze the real estates of the south side in the area of Mt. Kumgang was "an unilateral step to dramatically bedevil the south-north relations" and "south Korea would sternly react to it on its evident principle".  
					 Earlier, he, addressing a session of the "National Assembly," bragged that "a measure is in preparation to convince the north that its measure to freeze the real estates was a wrong one."
					
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: What he uttered reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the Thief!"
					
					 Once again clarifying the background against which the north was compelled to take the above-said measure, the commentary asserts that it was quite natural for the north to have taken such measure as it was impossible to resume the tour of Mt. Kumgang due to the wrong attitude of the south Korean conservative group.
					
					 This being a hard reality, Hyon put their criminal actions on the shelf and impudently took issue with the just measure taken by the north side.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					  The conservative group is so foolish and ignorant as to contend that there would be neither persons who wish to tour Mt. Kumgang nor business for tourism without its help.
					
					 Regret always comes late. 
					
					The north will take a more crucial measure, should the conservative group continue letting loose the above-said sophism. 
					
					 What kind of additional measure the north side is to take entirely depends on the attitude of the south Korean conservative authorities.

articles.title: Koreans Called on to Throw Overboard S. Korean Traitors
articles.content:
Koreans Called on to Throw Overboard S. Korean Traitors
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The present regime of south Korea veiled with the word "pragmatism" is harmful to national reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a signed article.
					 The present ruling forces of south Korea are heinous traitors who inherited the crime-woven history of the preceding military dictators ill-famed for perpetrating anti-reunification acts, staking their fate on the permanent division of the nation, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The true colors of the south Korean conservative group as separatists found a vivid expression in the fact that they have persistently stood in the way of implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, dead-set against them. 
					
					 The said declarations are the great programmes for independent national reunification and landmarks of national reunification. Accordingly, to deny them precisely means denying the reunification of the country and to put a brake in the wheel to implement them cannot be interpreted otherwise than a treacherous anti-reunification act of perpetuating the division of the nation and blocking the way of national reunification.
					
					 The south Korean conservative group is insisting on the one-sided policy of confrontation with the DPRK while sticking to the sham "principle". This was prompted by its criminal attempt to totally derail the inter-Korean relations and block the grand march for national reunification.
					
					 The group is escalating the tension between the north and the south and increasing the danger of a war to an extreme phase. This brings into bolder relief its anti-reunification and bellicose nature.
					
					 Neither the reunification of the country nor durable peace and the security of the nation can be achieved so long as the anti-reunification group of traitors, the stooges of foreign forces, is allowed to stay in south Korea. 
					
					 In order to achieve as early as possible the reunification of the country, the cherished desire of all the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad, they should immediately throw overboard the anti-reunification group of traitors desperately standing in its way.

articles.title: S. Korean Called on to Come out to Judge Dictatorial Regime
articles.content:
S. Korean Called on to Come out to Judge Dictatorial Regime
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Organizations for the movement for the nation and democracy in south Korea at a meeting held in Seoul on April 19 to mark the 50th anniversary of the April 19 Popular Uprising called on the people to come out in actions to judge the fascist dictatorial regime.
					 Speakers at the meeting deplored that it is half a century since the uprising but an emergency situation is now prevailing in south Korea due to the present treacherous and anti-reunification regime little different from the Syngman Rhee regime.
					
					 Stressing the need to judge the present arrogant regime and demonstrate the will of the public through the forthcoming "election to the local self-governing bodies", they called upon all the progressive forces to solidarize and unite and struggle in the spirit of the April 19 Popular Uprising to surely punish the dictatorial regime. 
					
					 The Youth Solidarity of south Korea also issued a statement on the same day on the said occasion at which it said that in order to realize the desire of the uprisers, it is necessary to surely punish the dictatorial regime with the above-said election as a momentum and hold with splendor the event of the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Authorities' Suppression Blasted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Authorities' Suppression Blasted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea in a statement on April 17 demanded the puppet authorities stop the unjust suppression of the progressive forces.
					 The statement accused the detectives of the "Security Investigation Group" in Kwangju of walking off Kim Hyon Ung, student of Jonnam National University who was chief of the Action Headquarters of the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils for 2008, on the university campus on April 16 on the charge of violating the "National Security Law".
					
					 The statement declared the arrest of Kim perpetrated by them in the wake of their crackdown upon members of the Teachers Trade Union and the Government Employees' Union, former core members of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration, the representative of the Internet Broadcasting Service "Chongchun", the chairman of the Rowon Youth Association, etc. betrays the sinister intention of the authorities to get rid of the political crisis through their fascist rule.
					
					 If the authorities try to bind the masses hand and foot more tightly through the fascist rule under the pretext of "security", the people will stage actions to judge the regime in the upcoming "election to the local self-governing bodies," it warned, urging the fascist authorities to bear this in mind and stop at once their unreasonable suppression of the progressive forces.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan sponsored an event at the Korean Center in Bishkek on April 15 to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
					The participants in the event laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il to pay respects to them.
					
					 Pak Kyong Ho, chairman of the confederation, said in his speech that Kim Il Sung embarked on the road of revolution in his early years to defeat the gangster-like Japanese imperialists and liberate Korea and carried out the historic cause of building the party and the state.
					
					 Recalling the exploits of the President, the compatriots have come to realize more keenly how great man the Korean nation had had as its leader, the speaker said.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has energetically worked to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation, the lifelong desire of the President, he said, adding that the overseas compatriots, too, are blessed with illustrious leaders generation after generation as they are guided by him.
					
					 He called upon all the compatriots to contribute to the building of a thriving nation and national reunification true to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Then, there was an art performance.

articles.title: Bulletins Issued to Commemorate
articles.content:
Bulletins Issued to Commemorate
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Colombia and Democratic Congo issued bulletins to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
					 Carried in the bulletin "Independence and President Kim Il Sung" issued by the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia on April 11 were articles titled "Holding high the banner of independence", "Heroic epic of defence of sovereignty" and "Provision of rock-firm self-supporting economy".
					
					 In those articles the bulletin noted that Kim Il Sung fathered the Juche idea, the Songun idea, led the anti-Japanese armed struggle to liberate Korea, founded the DPRK and worked miracles of history by defeating the U.S. imperialists, who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 It said that the independent national economy of the DPRK reached the high level whereby it successfully launched at one go the satellites manufactured with its own efforts and technology 100 per cent and that thanks to this economy the DPRK has definitely ensured independence in politics and self-reliance in national defence.
					
					 The preparatory committee of Democratic Congo to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung on April 15 released a bulletin carrying a portrait of smiling President and articles praising his undying exploits.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in South Africa, Norway and Bulgaria and seminars in Sweden, Uganda and Pakistan between April 11 and 16 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party and chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, said that President Kim Il Sung is the peerless hero as he devoted all his life only to the happiness of the people and performed undying exploits for the world socialist movement.
					
					 He stressed that with his Songun politics General Secretary Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into an invincible power and a great country which no formidable enemy dares provoke.
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Norway praised Kim Il Sung as a great revolutionary and peerless statesman who dedicated his all to global independence.
					
					 He expressed invariable support and solidarity with the Korean people in the drive to build a prosperous and powerful country.
					
					 Simeon Ignatov, chairman of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, said that rosy is the future of the Korean people who are striving to realize national reunification by means of federacy formula while defending the sovereignty of the country.
					
					 The themes of seminars in Sweden, Uganda and Pakistan were "Exploits of President Kim Il Sung", "Essence of Immortal Juche Idea" and "HE Kim Il Sung, Eternal President of DPRK".
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings and seminars in Norway, Bulgaria, Sweden and Pakistan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recorre el remozado Parque Juventud de Kaeson
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recorre el remozado Parque Juventud de Kaeson
Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 25 de abril (dia de fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea), el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recorrio el Parque Juventud de Kaeson remodelado como lugar de recreo del pueblo.
					Le acompanaron el secretario Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il y Kim Yang Gon y otros cuadros directivos, del CC del PTC y el primer vicecanciller Kang Sok Ju.
					
					Luego de escuchar la explicacion ante el plano del parque, se entero detalladamente del estado de construccion y operacion recorriendo largo tiempo las instalaciones de diversiones y juegos y de servicios publicos.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que el parque se haya reconstruido en el maximo nivel, de modo que no tenga defectos hasta en el remoto futuro, evaluo altamente las proezas de los constructores militares y los civiles del municipio de Moranbong, quienes han convertido el parque en un magnifico destino de recreo para el pueblo manifestando el espiritu de servicio abnegado al pueblo, y les expreso agradecimiento.
					
					Al contemplar largamente la figura feliz de los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares que pasan agradables momentos de descanso usando las instalaciones superlujosas de atracciones y juegos, se mostro muy complacido de poder garantizar a nuestro pueblo suficiente descanso cultural.
					
					Senalando que el parque situado al pie de la historica colina Moran es un lugar visitado por numerosos trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares, presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la administracion y la operacion del parque.
					
					Subrayo que los funcionarios y los empleados del parque deben poner en pleno juego la superioridad del regimen socialista de nuestro pais centrado en las masas populares haciendo bien la administracion de los equipos y el cuidado tecnico y mejorando constantemente su operacion con el espiritu de servicio abnegado al pueblo.
					
					Es buena la decoracion electrica del parque, dijo e indico la tarea de mejorar el adorno con bombillos conforme a las condiciones topograficas y a las caracteristicas de los equipos del parque para que este luzca hermoso tambien por la noche.
					
					Puntualizo que este moderno parque es el magnifico a la altura del nuevo siglo y subrayo que se debe facilitar mejores condiciones de vida cultural a los habitantes al acondicionar bien el Parque de Atracciones de Mangyongdae, el Lugar de Recreo del monte Taesong y otros demas parques y lugares de recreo como el Parque Juventud de Kaeson.
					
					Es muy importante proteger el medio ambiente en la administracion de los parques y lugares de recreo, senalo y destaco que se debe conservar in statu quo cada piedra y cada arbol de los lugares de recreo y en particular, tomar estrictas medidas para prevenir la contaminacion de la naturaleza.
					
					Especificamente, en la ciudad de Pyongyang se debe impulsar con vistas al futuro la repoblacion forestal para que esta capital entera se convierta en un parque de gran dimension y quede siempre como hermosa "ciudad dentro del parque".
					
					En la consigna "!Servir al pueblo!" estan reflejadas la firme voluntad y decision de nuestro partido que dedica todo lo suyo por la felicidad del pueblo poniendo en el primer lugar los intereses del pueblo, senalo e instruyo a todos los funcionarios vivir y luchar como servidores fieles al pueblo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il ordena ascender grados militares de comandantes del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il ordena ascender grados militares de comandantes del EPC
Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ATCC) -- El Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea
					 Kim Jong Il emitio el dia 23 la orden no. 0046 para ascender los grados militares de comandantes del EPC.
					La Unidad 963 del EPC realizo anteriormente meritos extraordinarios en la construccion socialista, en particular, en la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Nyongwon y la Presa de Compuertas de Mirim, apunto en la orden el Comandante Supremo.
					
					Prosiguio que hoy tambien, esa unidad crea continuamente milagros e innovaciones en la construccion de los objetos a su cargo empleando plenamente el espiritu revolucionario de los militares en la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon, frente avanzado de la edificacion de una gran potencia prospera, y desempena magnificamente su papel de vanguardia y brigada.
					
					Convencido de que los miembros de mando de la unidad apoyaran con fidelidad tambien en el futuro la direccion del partido defendiendo firmemente con armas la causa revolucionaria del Juche y cumpliendo plenamente con su honrosa mision y deber de grueso de la revolucion en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera socialista, el ordeno elevar sus grados militares con motivo del significativo Dia de la Fundacion del EPC (25 de abril).
					
					Segun la orden, Yun Jong Rin se hizo general de ejercito y Kim Song Dok, coronel general.

articles.title: DDILF toma medidas de confiscar bienes inmuebles de la parte Sur
articles.content:
DDILF toma medidas de confiscar bienes inmuebles de la parte Sur
Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ATCC) -- El portavoz de la Direccion de Desarrollo Integral de Lugares Famosos (DDILF) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 23 la siguiente declaracion:
					Hace poco, frente a la grave situacion en que quedaron cerradas por completo las posibilidades del reinicio del turismo al monte Kumgang debido a la brutal campana conflictiva anti-RPDC de las autoridades surcoreanas y su actitud desleal, tomamos la resuelta medida de accion de congelar como primer paso 5 objetos entre los bienes inmuebles de la parte surcoreana en esa zona turistica, los cuales no servian para nada.
					
					 Esto devino el justo ejercicio de la soberania de la RPDC y del legitimo derecho de sancion que conviene totalmente a la costumbre y los reglamentos internacionales.
					
					  Hasta la fecha, hemos realizado todos los esfuerzos sinceros por reanudar el turismo y dispensado la indulgencia al alcance de nuestras posibilidades hasta el ultimo momento en que la labor turistica cayo en la crisis de fracaso.
					
					  Pero, la parte surcoreana, lejos de meditar en la sinceridad y magnanimidad nuestras, arrepentirse de sus actos criminales y pedir disculpas, actuo con mas altaneria hablando de la "retirada de la medida de congelacion" y desafio frontalmente abogando por la "contramedida" a partir de su logica de bandido.
					
					  En particular, el ministro titere de Reunificacion surcoreano Hyon In Thaek trato de amenazar a alguien a su manera hablando de que si la RPDC toma las medidas adicionales de congelacion, "le haria frente rotundo".
					
					  Por su parte, el traidor Lee Myung Bak esta tan obsesionado por la confrontacion con la RPDC que no vacilo en cometer esa provocacion atrevida de criticar hasta los actos dedicados al Dia del Sol.
					
					  Por otra parte, la banda de titeres surcoreanos habla de la ruptura total de las relaciones Norte-Sur y hasta de "no reparar en la guerra" vinculando absurdamente el caso del hundimiento de su buque de guerra con la RPDC. 
					
					Ahora, la situacion esta al extremo de crisis, o sea, en la disyuntiva del estallido o no de la guerra. 
					
					Bajo tales circunstancias, el turismo al monte Kumgang resulta una cuestion de ni pensarlo y es natural que la RPDC no dispense mas generosidad y magnanimidad a la parte Sur.
					
					Se va expirando abril, tiempo limite que propusimos para dejar abierta la puerta al turismo del monte Kumgang.
					
					Se aumentan cada dia mas nuevos socios que aspiran a participar en ese proyecto turistico.
					
					Claro esta que la RPDC no estara con brazos cruzados en esta buena temporada del turismo teniendo en su territorio ese lugar famoso sin quedarse impotente de hacer lo que debe hacer por culpa de la camarilla de los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Puesto que esta banda se obstina en impedir y rehusar la reanudacion del turismo, como ya ha declarado, la RPDC tomara sucesivamente las resueltas medidas de castigo. 
					
					Bajo la autorizacion del organo competente, la DDILF de la RPDC declara solemnemente que ejecutara las siguientes medidas secundarias de accion, consecutivas a las primarias de congelar los bienes inmuebles de la parte Sur en la zona turistica del monte Kumgang:
					
					 Primera, confiscar todos los bienes del centro de entrevista del monte Kumgang y la estacion de bomberos -propiedades de las autoridades surcoreanas- y de las 5 instituciones pertenecientes a la "Corporacion del Turismo del Sur de Corea" como la casa cultural, el sitio de banos termales y la oficina de exencion de impuestos, que ya habian sido congelados, como recompensa de las perdidas sufridas por nuestra parte por la suspension del turismo a largo plazo.
					
					  Los inmuebles incautados seran propiedades de la RPDC o trasladados a los nuevos socios siguiendo el procedimiento legal.
					
					  Segunda, congelar todos los inmuebles surcoreanos restantes en la zona turistica del monte Kumgang y deportar al personal que los cuidaba.
					
					 La banda de titeres surcoreanos es responsable de estas medidas de congelar y confiscar los bienes inmuebles en esa zona porque son ellos mismos quienes la causaron.
					
					 Es una tragedia y verguenza de verdad la interrupcion definitiva del turismo al monte Kumgang de los habitantes surcoreanos que vino realizandose durante los 10 anos pasados centrando la atencion y causando la alegria de todos los coreanos y los extranjeros.
					
					  Toda la nacion coreana, inclusive la poblacion surcoreana, maldecira de generacion en generacion a la camarilla del titere Lee Myung Bak que quebro finalmente la labor turistica al monte Kumgang que generaba la esperanza en la reunificacion.
					
					 Si la camarilla de titeres surcoreanos desafia imprudentemente hablando de "hacer frente duro" a las debidas medidas de la RPDC, se tomaran las otras medidas consecutivas mas temibles.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion militar de Cuba
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion militar de Cuba
Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 23 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae en un ambiente amistoso con la delegacion militar de las Fuerzas Armadas Revolucionarias de Cuba encabezada por el viceministro y jefe del Estado Mayor General de las FAR, Alvaro Lopez Miera.
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Pak Jae Gyong, viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el embajador de la Republica de Cuba en Corea, Jose Manuel Galego Montano, y el agregado militar de esta sede diplomatica, Leonardo Perez Mesa.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena la campana mediatica anti-RPDC en Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena la campana mediatica anti-RPDC en Japon
Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ATCC) -- En un comentario individual divulgado hoy, el periodico Minju Joson condeno a los conservadores y ultraderechistas organos de prensa de Japon como "Sankei Shimbun", Fuji TV y Nihon TV que libran una demencial demagogia anti-RPDC censurando y calumniando perversamente la idea, el regimen y el sistema de ella.
					 La cada vez mas abierta campana publicitaria anti-RPDC de las televisiones ultraderechistas de Japon significa flagrante violacion y desafio a la soberania y la dignidad de Corea, siendo infraccion grave del derecho de autor que contraviene a la ley internacional, comienza el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					 Tales cadenas de TV transmiten las peliculas coreanas, que fueron difundidas por satelite, despues de adaptarlas a su albedrio sin el consentimiento de los organos que manejan los derechos de autor.
					
					  Esta conducta tan sucia muestra que Japon es el pais gangsteril que habla mucho de la "observacion" de la ley internacional cuando le conviene y la viola sin vacilacion alguna para sus intereses mezquinos.
					
					  Los medios de prensa derechistas de Japon se enfrascan libremente en la creacion de la opinion publica anti-RPDC a base de fraudes, exageraciones y falsificaciones porque cuentan con el amparo y el tacito permiso de las autoridades.
					
					  Por su parte, "Sankei Shimbun" y otros periodicos ultraderechistas japoneses han venido utilizando en la siniestra demagogia contra la RPDC las oraciones y frases plagiadas de los articulos divulgados en las publicaciones coreanas o los datos tergiversados e inventados.
					
					  Resulta una burla y engano a la prensa el hecho de que quienes hablan de la "objetividad de las informaciones" son los que inventan en sus antros las publicaciones anti-RPDC sin querer ver ni escuchar las verdades de la realidad de esta.
					
					  La RPDC no estara jamas con brazos cruzados ante esa histerica campana mediatica con su contra.
					
					  Los conspiradores japoneses pagaran muy caro sus actos de provocacion politica.
